entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 09:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -12.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
